title: A Random Walk Down Wall Street
note: Explains how markets are efficient and why index funds make sense.

title: Common Stocks and Uncommon Profits
note: Philip Fisher’s timeless lessons on growth stock investing.

title: Essays of Warren Buffett
note: Key shareholder letters curated by Buffett himself.

title: Flash Boys
note: A look into high-frequency trading and market manipulation.

title: Little Book of Common Sense Investing
note: Jack Bogle on why indexing wins over active management.

title: Market Wizards
note: Interviews with legendary traders and their strategies.

title: One Up On Wall Street
note: Peter Lynch on spotting investment opportunities in plain sight.

title: Principles: Life and Work
note: Ray Dalio shares the principles that shaped Bridgewater.

title: Reminiscences of a Stock Operator
note: A semi-autobiographical story of a legendary speculator.

title: The Alchemy of Finance
note: George Soros explains reflexivity and market behavior.

title: The Intelligent Investor
note: Benjamin Graham’s guide to value investing.

title: The Psychology of Money
note: Morgan Housel explains the behavioral side of finance.

title: Unshakeable
note: Tony Robbins' strategies for building long-term wealth.
